formalpara.title: Internal help for this application in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'ChanIsAvail' =-
[Synopsis] Check channel availability
[Description] ChanIsAvail(Technology/resource[&Technology2/resource2...][|options]): This application will check to see if any of the specified channels are available. The following variables will be set by this application: ${AVAILCHAN} - the name of the available channel, if one exists ${AVAILORIGCHAN} - the canonical channel name that was used to create the channel ${AVAILSTATUS} - the status code for the available channel Options: s - Consider the channel unavailable if the channel is in use at all j - Support jumping to priority n+101 if no channel is available
